item.title: 索尼年度利润下降 7%，PS5 目标略有偏离
item.description: 日本索尼公司周二公布，受金融业务表现的影响，该公司的年度营业利润下降了 7%。【原文：Japan's Sony Group reported a 7% fall in annual operating profit on Tuesday, hit by the performance of its financial business.】

item.title: Cryptoverse：散户交易者坐等比特币反弹
item.description: 曾经推动比特币大涨的散户交易员大军现在怎么样了？【原文：What's happened to the army of retail traders who used to drive bitcoin's biggest rallies?】

item.title: 拜耳第一季度调整后利润超出市场预期
item.description: 拜耳公司周二公布，第一季度调整后盈利略有下降，但由于处方药和农业部门的业绩好于预期，超出了分析师的预测。【原文：Bayer on Tuesday reported a marginal decline in its adjusted earnings in the first quarter, but beat analysts' forecasts on better-than-expected performance at its prescription drugs and agriculture divisions.】

item.title: 大牌基金扎堆房地产债务，银行纷纷撤退
item.description: 世界上一些最大的投资者正在更深入地进军商业地产贷款领域，因为他们要从退缩的银行手中抢夺市场份额，并押注于房地产价格暴跌的终结。【原文：Some of the world's largest investors are making deeper inroads into lending to commercial property, as they snap up market share from retreating banks and bet on an end to the sharp drops in real estate prices.】

item.title: 欧元回升使美元 "大猩猩 "无法破坏欧洲央行利率前景
item.description: 得益于更乐观的经济背景，欧元暂时没有跌至与美元平价的水平，这让欧洲中央银行的决策者们松了一口气，他们可能正在努力摆脱美联储货币政策前景的影响。【原文：The euro has resisted falling to parity with the dollar for now, thanks to a rosier economic backdrop, to the relief of European Central Bank policymakers who could be struggling to detach themselves from the Federal Reserve's monetary policy outlook.】

item.title: 消息人士称，以 Blackstone 为首的财团看好印度 Haldiram 的零食业务
item.description: 两位直接知情的消息人士称，包括 Blackstone、新加坡国有基金 GIC 和阿布扎比投资局 (ADIA) 在内的一个财团正在与印度 Haldiram's 公司谈判，以获得其零食业务的多数股权，估值高达 85 亿美元。【原文：A consortium including Blackstone , Singapore state fund GIC and Abu Dhabi Investment Authority (ADIA) is in talks with India's Haldiram's for a majority stake in its snacks business at a valuation of up to $8.5 billion, two sources with direct knowledge said.】

item.title: 早间竞价：市场关注美国 CPI 和历史新高
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 投资者预计必和必拓将再次提高英美资源集团的报价
item.description: 必和必拓集团（BHP Group）和英美资源集团（Anglo American）的投资者周二称，必和必拓集团很可能第二次提高对英美资源集团430亿美元收购要约的甜度，并可能增加现金。【原文：BHP Group is likely to sweeten its $43 billion takeover offer for Anglo American for a second time and possibly add cash, investors in both companies said on Tuesday, after the London-headquartered target rejected a higher bid.】

item.title: Uber 将收购 Delivery Hero 在台湾的 foodpanda 外卖业务
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies）周二表示，将以 9.5 亿美元现金收购 Delivery Hero 在台湾的 foodpanda 外卖业务。【原文：Uber Technologies will acquire Delivery Hero's foodpanda delivery business in Taiwan for $950 million in cash, the companies said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 亚洲股市创 15 个月新高，交易商静待 CPI
item.description: 周二，亚洲股市在15个月高点附近徘徊，美元在备受期待的美国通胀数据公布前表现坚挺，而日本央行稍稍缩减了债券购买计划，日本债券受到挤压。【原文：Asian shares hovered around 15-month highs on Tuesday and the dollar was firm ahead of highly anticipated U.S. inflation data, while Japanese bonds were squeezed as the central bank pulled back a little on its bond buying programme.】

item.title: 交易员关注美国通胀数据，美元随之漂移；日元疲软成为焦点
item.description: 美元周二持稳，因为投资者在等待本周的通胀报告，该报告可能会影响美国的利率前景，而日元则在两周低点附近徘徊，激起了对干预的担忧。【原文：The dollar was steady on Tuesday as investors awaited an inflation report this week that will likely shape the U.S. rates outlook, while the yen was hovering near a two-week low, stoking intervention worries.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，沃尔玛将裁减数百名公司员工并迁移其他员工
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一援引知情人士的话报道，沃尔玛正在裁减数百个公司职位，并要求大多数远程员工搬到办公室工作。【原文：Walmart is cutting hundreds of corporate jobs and asking most remote workers to move to offices, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 油价因供应前景趋紧而上扬
item.description: 石油价格周二上涨，原因是运营中断、需求增加和自愿减产导致供需平衡趋紧。【原文：Oil prices rose on Tuesday as the supply-demand balance looked set to tighten on operational disruptions, stronger demand and voluntary output cuts.】

item.title: 日元疲软提振进口成本，日本 4 月批发通胀率保持稳定
item.description: 日本央行周二公布的数据显示，由于日元汇率下跌推高了进口成本，4月份日本批发价格环比上涨0.9%，与上月持平。【原文：Japan's wholesale prices rose 0.9% in April from a year earlier, steady from the previous month as the yen's decline pushed up import costs, central bank data showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: Rumble 就数字广告行为起诉谷歌
item.description: 视频分享平台 Rumble 周一表示，它已起诉谷歌，认为这家科技巨头在其一系列数字广告产品中采取了反竞争做法，并要求谷歌赔偿超过 10 亿美元的损失。【原文：Video sharing platform Rumble said on Monday it has sued Google , arguing the tech giant has engaged in anticompetitive practices across its range of digital advertising products and sought damages in excess of $1 billion.】

item.title: 工会和立法者抗议波音公司消防员停工
item.description: 工会领导人和美国立法者周一批评了波音公司对其工会消防员的停工，并敦促该飞机制造商达成合同协议。【原文：Union leaders and U.S. lawmakers on Monday criticized Boeing's lockout of its unionized firefighters and urged the planemaker to reach a contract deal.】

item.title: 墨西哥航空公司集团在美国首次公开募股文件中披露年收入猛增 29
item.description: 墨西哥航空公司 Grupo Aeroméxico SAB de CV 周一在其美国首次公开募股的文件中披露，该公司 2023 年的收入将猛增 29%。【原文：Grupo Aeroméxico SAB de CV recorded a 29% jump in revenue for 2023, the Mexican airline disclosed in its paperwork for an initial public offering in the United States on Monday.】

item.title: 早间竞价在中国加征关税消息和美国 CPI 前踯躅不前
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 摩根大通回击 ISS 关于遣散费和独立主席的建议
item.description: 摩根大通周一反驳了代理顾问机构股东服务公司（ISS）就股东关于遣散费和独立董事会主席的提案提出的建议。【原文：JPMorgan Chase on Monday pushed back against recommendations made by proxy advisor Institutional Shareholder Services (ISS) on a shareholder proposal on severance payouts and the independent board chairman.】

item.title: 纽约联储报告警告贴现窗口的污名可能永远不会消失
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行周一发布报告称，美联储需要重新考虑如何向银行提供快速流动性。【原文：The Federal Reserve needs to rethink how it provides swift liquidity to banks, a report from the Federal Reserve Bank of New York said on Monday.】

item.title: 美国邮政将推迟处理网络整合计划
item.description: 美国邮政总局局长路易斯-德乔伊（Louis DeJoy）同意暂停进一步整合邮政服务处理网络的计划，因为两党参议员团体对邮件投递的影响表示担忧。【原文：U.S. Postmaster General Louis DeJoy has agreed to pause planned further consolidation of the postal service's processing network after a bipartisan group of senators raised concerns about the impact on mail deliveries.】

item.title: 彭博社报道：大众汽车探索出售卡车制造商特拉托公司股票
item.description: 彭博新闻社周一援引知情人士的话报道称，大众汽车正在探索出售其重型卡车制造部门 Traton SE 价值多达 10 亿欧元（10.8 亿美元）的股票。【原文：Volkswagen is exploring the sale of as much as 1 billion euros ($1.08 billion) worth of stock in its heavy truckmaking arm Traton SE , Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，卡夫亨氏正在探索出售奥斯卡-梅耶业务
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一援引知情人士的话报道，卡夫亨氏正在探讨出售旗下的奥斯卡-梅耶肉类业务，价格可能在 30 亿至 50 亿美元之间。【原文：Kraft Heinz is exploring a sale of its Oscar Mayer meats business that could fetch anything between $3 billion to $5 billion, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美联储研究显示，价格压力不应归咎于企业贪婪
item.description: 根据旧金山联邦储备银行经济学家周一发表的研究报告，企业哄抬物价并不是美国通货膨胀的主要驱动因素。【原文：Corporate price gouging has not been a primary driver of U.S. inflation, according to research published on Monday by economists at the Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，苹果将在美国以外地区销售 Vision Pro 头戴式耳机
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一报道，苹果公司正准备在美国以外的地区销售其 Vision Pro 混合现实头盔，以刺激市场对其多年来最昂贵的赌注的需求。【原文：Apple is gearing up to sell its Vision Pro mixed-reality headset outside the United States, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, in a bid to invigorate demand for its most expensive bet in years.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，Meta 公司正在探索带摄像头的人工智能辅助耳塞
item.description: 据 The Information 周一援引熟悉内情的员工的话报道，Meta Platforms 公司正在探索制造由人工智能驱动的带摄像头的耳机。【原文：Meta Platforms is exploring making earphones powered by artificial intelligence with cameras, The Information reported on Monday citing employees familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 伊利诺伊州财政部长敦促埃克森股东投票反对首席执行官伍兹
item.description: 周一的一份文件显示，在埃克森美孚对两名股东提起诉讼之际，伊利诺伊州财政部长敦促埃克森美孚股东投票反对其执行董事长兼首席执行官达伦-伍兹（Darren Woods）的当选。【原文：The Illinois state treasurer has urged Exxon Mobil shareholders to vote against the election of Executive Chair and CEO Darren Woods, as the oil major pursues a lawsuit against two shareholders, a filing showed on Monday.】

item.title: 特斯拉就工厂工人性骚扰诉讼达成和解
item.description: 特斯拉已就一名前工厂员工的诉讼达成和解，该员工称自己因投诉严重的性骚扰而被解雇，而这家电动汽车制造商还面临着其他一系列指控工作场所性别和种族歧视的案件。【原文：Tesla has settled a lawsuit by a former factory employee who says she was fired for complaining about severe sexual harassment, as the electric carmaker faces a series of other cases alleging workplace sex and race discrimination.】

item.title: 梅琳达-盖茨卸任比尔及梅琳达-盖茨基金会联合主席一职
item.description: 梅琳达-弗伦奇-盖茨（Melinda French Gates）周一表示，她将卸任比尔-盖茨基金会（Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation）联合主席一职。【原文：Melinda French Gates said on Monday she is stepping down as co-chair of the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation.】

item.title: 阿根廷 4 月份月通胀率重回个位数
item.description: 据路透社调查的分析师估计，由于阿根廷经济停滞不前，物价上涨逐渐放缓，4 月份阿根廷的月通胀率可能在半年来首次回落到个位数。【原文：Argentina's monthly inflation rate likely dipped back into single digits for the first time in half a year in April, analysts polled by Reuters estimated, amid a gradual slowdown in price rises as the country's economy stalls.】
